aboutPage.about_kui_alphabeted: អំពីគេហទំព័រអក្សរក្រមកួយ
aboutPage.lorem_explain: មុខងារអក្សរក្រមកួយ ត្រូវបានរចនាឡើងជាមួយនឹងបេសកកម្មក្នុងការថែរក្សា ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងធ្វើឱ្យភាសាកួយ មានអ្នកស្គាល់ឱ្យកាន់តែច្រើនឡើងវិញ ដែលជាធាតុផ្សំដែលមិនអាចកាត់ថ្លៃបាននៃបេតិកភណ្ឌវប្បធម៌របស់យើង

aboutPage.our_mession_content: Organize communities and develop systems of indigenous Kui communities to create Kui ethnic pride, protect community interests and be self-sufficient.
aboutPage.our_vision: ចក្ខុវិស័យ
aboutPage.our_vision_content: Indigenous Communities are strong solidarity and have the right to self-determination for sustainable development and conservation.

core_value_content.list_1: mote the knowledge and culture of the Kui indigenous people
core_value_content.list_5: Focus on indigenous peoples and the vulnerable

aboutPage.our_goal: គោលដៅរបស់យើង
aboutPage.our_goal_content: Indigenous Kui men, women, elders, youths, and children have solidarity and participate in land and natural resources management, conservation of identity and culture, and socio/economic development.

We_work_with.title: We work with
We_work_with.content: Our strategies and programs relevant for work with diverse groups, both directly and in partnerships, including:
We_work_with.list_2: Sub-national administrations and institutions and departments of the government.
We_work_with.list_6: Development Partners (includes UN agencies and embassies).

our_unique.title: Our Unique
our_unique.list_1: The only indigenous Kui led-organization in Cambodia
